title: ROGERTHAT777
author: ROGERTHAT777
content: Hi guys i have traded many coins on the metamask iphone version 10 before and its not loading now when I go to trade a coin it won't add the bnb that's already in my metmask to the pancake swap when I connect it brings me to the update the app and then when I click the metmask little logo it says oops something went wrong can't load that page and I cna't load the coin.  I have lots of little coins I am trying to not have to reload them all it would be  nightmare to do that all over again. I can trade on desktop but Id much prefer the phone

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Metamask on iPhone minimum requirement is IOS 11[1], so, you have to upgrade your OS. If your phone is not supported by the latest OS releases, using it on the Desktop or changing to another wallet are viable options.[1] https://apps.apple.com/us/app/metamask-blockchain-wallet/id1438144202

comments.author: ROGERTHAT777
comments.body: I mean the phone i think is a 10 the software says 15.4.1 ?

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: ROGERTHAT777 on May 20, 2022, 03:47:46 AMI mean the phone i think is a 10 the software says 15.4.1 ? Oh, I see, you mean you have iPhone X and the IOS version is 15.4.1.I checked that the latest Metamask version for iPhone is v5.1.0, have you updated it to the latest version? And how do you connect PancakeSwap to Metamask? Did you use the Metamask browser feature?
